code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signup(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const signup=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/signup/",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({name,email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(data.message){alert("Signup successful");navigate("/login");}else{alert(data.error||"Signup failed");}}catch(err){alert("Backend not reachable");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Signup"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Name",onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signup,children:"Signup"})]});}export default Signup;
